short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gives access your bookmarks with fuzzy search and simple New Tab Page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Access your bookmarks with fuzzy filtering as in your favorite editors!

Ever wanted same user experience as in your favorite text editors, but for the browser?

We are too!

That's why we created this extension, so you can access your stuff the way you are used to.

Free and Open Source.

Source code and bug-tracker:
https://github.com/YurySolovyov/fuzzymark
